front.title: Guidelines for Authors and Reviewers of MIB Documents

abstract.t: This memo provides guidelines for authors and reviewers of IETFstandards-track specifications containing MIB modules. Applicableportions may be used as a basis for reviews of other MIB documents.This document obsoletes RFC 4181, incorporating its update publishedin RFC 4841.Comments and discussion are invited on the opsawg@ietf.org mailinglist.
